name: nativescript-app-sync
description: Use AppSync to hot deploy updates to your app.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.ios.release: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --release
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo-ng.android: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && npm run package && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && rimraf platforms/android
scripts.preparedemo-ng: npm run build && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && rimraf platforms/android
scripts.setup: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build android
scripts.test.android: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns test android
scripts.test.ios: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns test ios
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-app-sync && cd ../src
